tweet.html: RT @StateINL: INL has a new leader! Watch Kirsten Madison talk ab't the @StateDept effort to fight the #opioidcrisis, among other INL efforts to safeguard the American ppl thru combating crime, bolstering #LawEnforcement & #RuleOfLaw globally: youtu.be/BE8lu_2Lmrg. #TheReadout
